'''Memory of the Frostbearing Tree''' is a [[Diagram]] obtained by reaching Offering Level 10 in [[Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude]]. Once used, it allows the player to [[Forging|forge]] the 4-Star [[Catalysts|Catalyst]] [[Frostbearer]].
